prompt:
This is an image of an **unpaved road surface**. The edges of the image may contain black areas that are not part of the road surface. Please ignore these areas when assessing the condition and focus only on the road surface area visible in the image. Describe the surface condition of this image in the following aspects:
Surface Condition
Color Uniformity
Defects.
text: The surface condition of the road in the image is poor. The road appears to be unpaved and has a rough texture. The color uniformity is not very good, as there are black areas surrounding the road surface. There are also some defects visible on the road, such as cracks and uneven surfaces. These factors contribute to the overall poor condition of the road.
